91 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
92 class stDummyTree: public stMetricTree<ObjectType, EvaluatorType>{
93  public:
97  typedef ObjectType tObject;
98 
103  typedef EvaluatorType tMetricEvaluator;
104 
108  typedef stResult <ObjectType> tResult;
109 
115  stDummyTree(stPageManager * pageman);
116 
120  virtual ~stDummyTree(){
121 
122  if (HeaderPage != NULL){
123  // Release the header page.
124  this->myPageManager->ReleasePage(HeaderPage);
125  }//end if
126  }//end ~stDummyTree
127 
135  virtual bool Add(tObject * obj);
136 
140  virtual long GetNumberOfObjects(){
141  return Header->ObjectCount;
142  }//end GetNumberOfObjects
143 
147  virtual long GetNodeCount(){
148  return Header->NodeCount;
149  }//end GetNodeCount
150 
154  virtual stCount GetMaxOccupation(){
155  return Header->MaxOccupation;
156  }//end GetMaxOccupation
157 
161  void SetMaxOccupation(stCount newValue){
162  if (newValue > Header->MaxOccupation){
163  Header->MaxOccupation = newValue;
164  }//end if
165  }//end SetMaxOccupation
166

316  typedef struct DummyTreeHeader{
320  stPageID Root;
321 
325  stSize ObjectCount;
326 
330  stSize NodeCount;
331 
335  stCount MaxOccupation;
336  } stDummyTreeHeader;
337 
342  stPage * HeaderPage;
343 
347  stDummyTreeHeader * Header;
348 
352  bool HeaderUpdate;
353 
357  void Create(){
358 
359  LoadHeader();
360  Header->Root = 0;
361  Header->ObjectCount = 0;
362  Header->NodeCount = 0;
363  Header->MaxOccupation = 0;
364  HeaderUpdate = true;
365  WriteHeader();
366  }//end Create
367 
371  void LoadHeader(){
372  HeaderPage = this->myPageManager->GetHeaderPage();
373  Header = (stDummyTreeHeader *) HeaderPage->GetData();
374  }//end LoadHeader
375 
379  void WriteHeader(){
380  if (HeaderUpdate){
381  this->myPageManager->WriteHeaderPage(HeaderPage);
382  HeaderUpdate = false;
383  }//end if
384  }//end WriteHeader
385 
389  void UpdateObjectCounter(int inc){
390  Header->ObjectCount += inc;
391  HeaderUpdate = true;
392  }//end UpdateObjectCounter
393 
394 };//end stDummyTree
